name: micro-frontend-monorepo
description: A simple monorepo with 2 micro-frontends and shared component library

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:host" "npm run dev:app1" "npm run dev:app2" "npm run dev:app3"
scripts.build:all: npm run build --workspace=shared-ui && npm run build --workspace=app1 && npm run build --workspace=app2 && npm run build --workspace=app3 && npm run build --workspace=host
